page.title: 11GAMES CHILDREN PLAY
page.content: {One Pick Barge:} One Pick Barge is a game for three or more players.You need a long stretch of ground with a line or wall at each end.You have one person on, who stands in the middle of the ground, while all the others stand at one end.The person who is one shouts the name of somebody who is against the wall.The person whose name has been called then attempts to get to the other end without being picked up by the person who is on.If the runner gets to the other end, all the players on the wall also try to get to the other end.If the person who is manages to catch somone that person is on with him.This carries on until everyone is on.The person who was caught first is on in the new game.
